description:
Any other props such as style or event listeners will also
be applied to the button.

label.description: The label to display in the button.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the button.

iconBefore.description: Boolean if the icon should be displayed before the label.

children.description:
A `FontIcon` to display in the button. It can be placed before
or after the label.

primary.description: Boolean if the button should be styled with the primary color.

secondary.description: Boolean if the button should be styled with the secondary color.

disabled.description: Boolean if the button is disabled.

href.description: An optional href to convert the button into a link button.

onClick.description: An optional function to call when the button is clicked.
